name: 林秀真
objective: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
schedule:
Week-1	Warn Up
Week-2	    Outside Reading
Week-3	 Ch.1---Personality
Week-4	 Ch.1---Personality
Week-5	 Ch.2---Punishment
Week-6	 Ch.2---Punishment
Week-7	 Ch.3.---Extensive reading
Week-8	 Ch.3.---Extensive reading
Week-9	Mid-Term Exam
Week-10	  Outside Reading
Week-11	  Ch.4---Money
Week-12	Ch.4---Money
Week-13	 Ch.5---Love
Week-14	 Ch.5---Love
Week-15	 Ch.6---Internet
Week-16	 Ch.6---Internet
Week-17	Presentation
Week18	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1.  Attendance 10%
2.  Quizzes   25%
3.  Oral Presentation  15%
4.  Mid-term +Final Exam 20%
5.  Proficiency Test 30%
